tool_description: Applies standardized color profiles and corrections to ensure accurate color reproduction across different display and print media.

source_profile.description: Current color profile of image: sRGB, AdobeRGB, ProPhotoRGB, camera_native

target_profile.description: Desired output color profile: sRGB, AdobeRGB, ProPhotoRGB

rendering_intent.description: Color conversion method: perceptual, relative, saturation, absolute

white_balance_adjustment.description: Whether to apply automatic white balance correction

error_messages: Image file not found: Specified filename does not exist or is inaccessible

Invalid target profile: Must be one of [sRGB, AdobeRGB, ProPhotoRGB]

usage: Apply after image quality validation to ensure consistent color reproduction. Choose appropriate profiles based on final use case (web, print, archival storage).

conversion_success.description: Whether color profile conversion was successful

color_delta.description: Measure of color change during conversion

profile_embedded.description: Whether color profile was successfully embedded in image
